Posts.Content: this is to oh - mary --I am having the same problems. The pain didn't start until after chemo was over. I have not been able to find out anything from my doctors. pain is mostly in my muscle area above my elbows (thick part of my arms) mostly in the muscle. I also have neuropathy in my feet/hands from the Taxol.
Posts.Title: Arm and leg pain after chemo is over
